tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinics ( 
    clinic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    clinic_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    clinic_address TEXT NOT NULL, 
    appointment_timeslot TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    patient_dob DATE NOT NULL, 
    patient_phone_number TEXT NOT NULL, 
    appointment_reminder_notification BOOLEAN NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    reminder_date DATE,
    reminder_time TIME,
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
    appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    clinic_id UUID REFERENCES Clinics(clinic_id),
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Clinics (
    clinic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    clinic_name VARCHAR(50),
    clinic_address VARCHAR(100),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Notifications (
    notification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_id UUID REFERENCES Appointments(appointment_id),
    notification_type VARCHAR(20),
    notification_content TEXT,
    sent_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
	patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	last_name TEXT,
	dob DATE,
	email TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
	appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients,
	doctor_id UUID REFERENCES Clinics,
	appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
	status TEXT
);
